backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods or logic.

frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing core frontend files including App, Cash App modal, global styles, and Tailwind config.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining CSS variables for light/dark themes and global background/text styling.

frontend/src/index.css: Frontend-specific Tailwind theme variables and global styles for light/dark mode with a monochrome aesthetic.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Root React entrypoint that initializes QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and renders App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
